dfischer.utils

Class AlertConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.AlertConfig

  • public class AlertConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for all configuration data of alert notifications.

      • alertsEnabled

        public boolean alertsEnabled()
        Return if sending of alert notifications is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if sending of alert notifications is enabled

      • setAlertsEnabled

        public void setAlertsEnabled(boolean alertsEnabled)
        Configure if sending of alert notifications is enabled or disabled.
        Parameters:
        alertsEnabled - true if sending of alert notifications is enabled

      • alertTransmissionProposed

        public boolean alertTransmissionProposed()
        Utility: allows to check if a alert notification should be send.
        Returns:
        true if ((alerts in general are enabled) AND (at least one alert device is enabled and in a ready state)).
        See Also:
        alertsEnabled(), AlertConfigNotificationDevices.hasEnabledAndReadyAlertDevices()

      • alertTransmissionProposed

        public boolean alertTransmissionProposed(AlertConfigGenericNotification genericNotification)
        Utility: allows to check if a alert notification should be send.
        Parameters:
        genericNotification - the alert notification
        Returns:
        true if ((alerts in general are enabled) AND (alerts for the specific notification are enabled) AND (at least one alert device is enabled and in a ready state)).
        See Also:
        alertsEnabled(), AlertConfigGenericNotification.notificationEnabled(), AlertConfigNotificationDevices.hasEnabledAndReadyAlertDevices()
